task.title: Migrate a legacy dashboard
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to migrate a legacy dashboard from version 13.5 or 14.x to the latest format.

context.p: When you copy the legacy dashboard, the system opens the legacy dashboard for edit, where you can add legacy content or new content. When you copy a legacy dashboard, the original is preserved in the list of legacy dashboards.
context.note: Adding legacy content to a dashboard creates a dashboard based on the latest dashboard functionality. However, the legacy reportlet might contain data that is based on the previous data platform.

p.b: To migrate a version 14.x legacy dashboard

step.cmd: In the Manage column, under Legacy Dashboards, click Copy to New Dashboard.

info.p: The copied dashboard opens in the dashboard layout editor.
